quotes.message: Going through puberty as a young girl is so confusing. This monster invades your body changes things and makes things grow and no one tells you what's going on.
quotes.name: Katharine Isabelle

quotes.message: Adolescence is a new birth, for the higher and more completely human traits are now born.
quotes.name: G. Stanley Hall

quotes.message: Adolescence is the age of cosmic yearnings and private passions, of social concern and personal agony. It is the age of inconsistency and ambivalence.
quotes.name: Haim Ginott

quotes.message: Adolescence is like cactus.
quotes.name: Anais Nin

quotes.message: Adolescence as the time when an individual recapitulates the savage stage of the race's past.
quotes.name: G. Stanley Hall

quotes.message: Adolescence in our culture for a young woman, for a girl, is a hard road.
quotes.name: Rodney Crowell

quotes.message: Growing moustache and beard is the sign puberty, not maturity.
quotes.name: Guru Sri Nayak

quotes.message: Puberty for a girl is like floating down a broadening river into an open sea.
quotes.name: G. Stanley Hall

quotes.message: Before puberty the child's personality has not yet formed and it is easier to guide its life and make it acquire specific habits of order, discipline, and work.
quotes.name: Antonio Gramsci

quotes.message: Adolescence represents an inner emotional upheaval, a struggle between the eternal human wish to cling to the past and the equally powerful wish to get on with the future.
quotes.name: Louise J. Kaplan

quotes.message: Adolescence has been recognised as a stage of human development since medieval times long, long before the industrial revolution and, as it is now, has long been seen as a phase which centers on the fusion of sexual and social maturity. Indeed, adolescence as a concept has as long a history as that of puberty, which is sometimes considered more concrete, and hence much easier to name and to recognize.
quotes.name: Terri E Apter

quotes.message: Puberty brought them together. Maturity drove them apart.
quotes.name: Himakshi Tarde

quotes.message: Adolescence is society's permission slip for combining physical maturity with psychological irresponsibility.
quotes.name: Bill Vaughan

quotes.message: Adolescence is a plague on the senses.
quotes.name: Henry Rollins

quotes.message: Adolescence is the conjugator of childhood and adulthood.
quotes.name: Louise J. Kaplan

quotes.message: The age of puberty is a crisis in the age of man worth studying. It is the passage from the unconscious to the conscious; from thesleep of passions to their rage.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Adolescence is just one big walking pimple.
quotes.name: Carol Burnett

quotes.message: Adolescence is perhaps nature's way of preparing parents to welcome the empty nest.
quotes.name: Karen Savage

quotes.message: Most of us have had that experience at around puberty of realising that, despite whatever efforts we put into our chosen sports, we will become at best competent.
quotes.name: Will Self

quotes.message: Adolescence is when girls experience social pressure to put aside their authentic selves and to display only a small portion of their gifts.
quotes.name: Mary Pipher
